name: I Wanna Defeat The Sinistar
description:
Things this game has:

  • 6 different levels, each being from a retro video game
  • 6 bosses that also come from retro video games
  • A hidden collectible Boshy in each level!
  • Slightly different Kid and Save sprites (cool)
  • {Bullet Point}
  • 0110011001100001011100100111010001110011

wow! this is a culmination of a month's worth of work!

controls are the exact same as any ol' iwbtg fan game

shift to jump, z to shoot.
